word:
Light to Shine Forth From Nashville.--Light will shine upon the workers in Nashville. From this center light will shine forth in the ministry of the Word, in the publication of books large and small. We have as yet merely touched the Southern field with the tips of our fingers. "The earth shall be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea" (Isaiah 11:9). The same Voice that at the beginning said, 


                                                         193 

"Let there be light," in these last days declares that a knowledge of God's Word shall not be confined merely to a few places.
